detailed design Faster RCNN method.from sentence: In this report , we propose a detailed design Faster RCNN method named FDNet1.0 for face detection , which achieves more decent performance than previous methods .

\" thin \" feature map.building: efficient yet accurate two - stage detector

deformable layer.from sentence: A deformable layer with fewer channels is attached to the backbone network to produce a " thin " feature map , which is subsequently fed to a full connected layer , building an efficient yet accurate two - stage detector .

multi-scale training and testing strateg.from sentence: Furthermore , the multi-scale training and testing strategy are also applied in our work .

comparable mean average precision ( m AP.from sentence: At testing time , we also find a comparable mean average precision ( m AP ) be achieved when the top - ranked proposals ( e.g. , 6000 ) are directly selected without NMS in the RPN stage over WIDER FACE dataset .
